## Ranges

The first two characters of the CCN represent the state in which the provider or
supplier is located. 

```{r}
#| label: medicare-ranges
#| echo: false
ccn::medicare_ranges |>
  collapse::slt(-start, -end) |> 
  collapse::fgroup_by(abbr, desc) |> 
  collapse::fsummarise(range = paste(range, collapse = ", ")) |> 
  gt::gt() |> 
  gtExtras::gt_theme_538(quiet = TRUE) |> 
  gt::tab_options(quarto.disable_processing = TRUE)
```
